question_text:
Question 25. 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
MSQ (2M)
Question ID : 8232513144
If the numerical value of 2-byte unsigned integer on a little endian computer is 255 more than that on 
big endian computer, which of the following choice represent(s) the unsigned integer on a little 
endian
(A)
0 4243

 
(B) 
0 6665

 
(C) 
0 0001

 
(D) 
0 0100

